Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJACDET WHERE IND_DEL= :IND_DEL AND SOLHOJACCODI = :SOLHOJACCODI ORDER BY DETASOLHCCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_SOLHOJACDET ( DETASOLHCCODI, SOLHOJACCODI, DATACATCODI, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :DETASOLHCCODI, :SOLHOJACCODI, :DATACATCODI, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )

UPDATE CAM_SOLHOJACDET SET SOLHOJACCODI = :SOLHOJACCODI, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE DETASOLHCCODI = :DETASOLHCCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJACDET ORDER BY DETASOLHCCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_SOLHOJACDET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE SOLHOJACCODI IN (SELECT SOLHOJACCODI FROM CAM_SOLHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI=:PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0') AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_SOLHOJACDET WHERE DETASOLHCCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
